item.title: [728] i need help with the bank pin interface :3
item.dc:creator: @ICouldUseSomeHelpWit ICouldUseSomeHelpWith728
item.description:
@ICouldUseSomeHelpWit wrote:

The base I am using is “ZenithScape”, I have a feeling that some people are going to say something along the lines of “That base sucks, it has issues”, I’m well aware of this but when I start a project I try to finish it.

I’ve managed to get the window to show but the buttons are missing, any help would be greatly appreciated, my code is:

	player.closeInterfaces();
	player.getInterfaceManager().sendInterface(13);
	player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(13, 25, "Exit");
	player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(13, 26, "Please enter a FOUR DIGIT PIN using the buttons below.");
	player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(13, 27, "Bank PIN");
	player.getPackets().sendIComponentText(13, 28, "First click the FIRST digit.");

Screenshot: http://s17.postimg.org/xj1ormum5/I_COULD_USE_SOME_HELP_LOL.png

Yes, I did attempt to search the forums first, I did not come up with anything for 728. Sorry If I somehow managed to miss it.

EDIT:

I forgot to mention, I haven’t done anything private server related since 2007 nor have I done interfaces, this is my first attempt, If I can get the buttons to show I’m fairly sure I could figure out the rest.

EDIT:

I’m really not sure about this, no one seems to want to help on this website and I’m just confused, am I doing something wrong? Am I not using the proper interface? Or is it an issue with the interface itself on the client? Someone please help me.

Read full topic
